#summary Patches to the 'official' helgrind 

Here we list the patches to the official helgrind that are made as a part of this project. 

== Test suite == 
See RacecheckUnittest. 

== Client requests / dynamic annotations == 
See [http://code.google.com/p/data-race-test/source/browse/trunk/unittest/dynamic_annotations.h dynamic_annotations.h] for details. 
Helgrind's part is in [http://code.google.com/p/data-race-test/source/browse/trunk/helgrind/hg_annotations.c hg_annotations.c]. 

== Fast SegmentID->Segment mapping == 
See `SEG_add()` in [http://code.google.com/p/data-race-test/source/browse/trunk/helgrind/hg_main.c hg_main.c]

== Speedup hack == 
Ignore memory addresses such that `(addr % X) != Y`. 

See `address_may_be_ignored` in [http://code.google.com/p/data-race-test/source/browse/trunk/helgrind/hg_main.c hg_main.c]
